title: The Beckoning sea
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles. Motion Picture Division and Stephen Kabak
brief_description: A capsule resume of the forces that a young man feels are oppressing him. Taken from an experimental collection of stories entitled “The Beat Generation and the Angry Young Men”. Short story writer: George Mandel.
